mapper.insert: insert into users (EMAIL, PASSWORD, FOURTEEN_AGREEMENT, GENDER, AD_AGREEMENT, PERSONAL_AUTHENTICATION, PHONE_NUMBER, PROFILE_NAME, NAME, `RANK`, PROFILE_IMG_NAME, PROFILE_IMG_URL, PROFILE_IMG_ORIGIN_NAME, CREATED_AT, MODIFIED_AT) values ( #{email}, #{password} , #{gender}, #{phoneNumber}" + ",#{profileName}, #{name}, #{rank}, #{profileImgName},#{profileImgUrl}" + ", #{profileImgOriginName}, #{createdAt}, #{modifiedAt})
